Rooms.name: Superior Room
Rooms.description: The Superior Room combines modern elegance and comfort, featuring a spacious layout, premium bedding, and a relaxing ambiance — perfect for both business and leisure travelers.

Rooms.name: superior Deluxe Room
Rooms.description: The Superior Deluxe Room offers an elegant blend of comfort and sophistication, featuring premium furnishings, a king-size bed, and a private balcony with a city or pool view.

Rooms.name: Luxury Suite, Ocean View
Rooms.description: The Luxury Suite Room offers an exceptional stay experience with elegant décor, a spacious living area, a private balcony, and breathtaking views — designed for guests who seek ultimate comfort and sophistication.

Rooms.name: Superior Double Room
Rooms.description: The Superior Double Room combines comfort and elegance, featuring a spacious layout, a king-size bed, and stylish décor — perfect for couples or business travelers.

Rooms.name: Super Balancy Double Room
Rooms.description: The Superior Balcony Double Room offers modern elegance and comfort, featuring a private balcony, a king-size bed, and contemporary décor for an unforgettable stay.

Rooms.name: Delux Double Room
Rooms.description: The Deluxe Double Room offers refined comfort and style, featuring elegant décor, a spacious layout, and a luxurious double bed — ideal for couples seeking relaxation and sophistication.
